News.Title: DPSC Reports Mixed Q2 Results with Revenue Growth but Lower Net Profit
News.Summary: DPSC reported quarterly net profit of 37.6 million rupees, down from 40.4 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue increased to 1.87 billion rupees compared to 1.49 billion rupees year-over-year. EBITDA rose to 67.8 million rupees from 40 million rupees, while EBITDA margin improved to 3.62% from 2.68% in the previous year.

News.Title: ChargeT Expands EV Charging Network in Eastern India
News.Summary: ChargeT, an electric vehicle charging infrastructure company, currently operates over 70 EV chargers across West Bengal, Tripura, and other eastern states of India. The company has set an ambitious goal to install 10,000 EV chargers by the year 2030, significantly expanding its presence in the region's electric vehicle charging market.

News.Title: India Power and ChargeT Launch EV Charging Hub in Kolkata
News.Summary: DPSC Ltd, through its subsidiaries India Power and ChargeT, has launched a public and commercial electric vehicle (EV) charging hub in a busy corporate area of Kolkata. The companies also have plans to upgrade the facility to use solar power for charging in the future.
